title: Participatory Online Learning Design Using Clickers in Hospitality Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental hospitality concepts and online learning tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Operates in a small-group project-based environment with digital device provision.

learning_goals: Learners can propose 3+ problem-solving strategies for hospitality scenarios via clicker-based activities
Learners can complete peer assessments and self-reflection reports at an 80%+ rate through real-time feedback systems
Learners can finalize drafts of service process improvement projects within 2 weeks through technology-based collaborative activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
